credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
title: Italy in One Volume
description: Fold out maps throughout attached to book. Ribbon attached to center of book. See A.1.146.A-M for ephemeral materials found in book.
inscriptions: pg. 178 "green" San Vitale - asterisk. "Blue" Mausoleo di Galla Placidia - asterisk. Bapistery - asterisk. pg. 180 multiple items with asterisks. Also, sketch and description of scene: "blue trees and white lambs, back cross gold, white plank in between mostly green figure in center apolinaire dark wood ceiling like Montreal.". Items with asterisk: pg. 186, 187, 190, 192, 193, 196, 197 (also note "VIP for Masaiccio"), 198, 199, 200 (also dried pressed flowers), 201, 202, 203, 204, 209, 212, 233, 238 (note: "VIP Tutti"), 239 (also note "Tiero della Fancisco"), 240, 492 (also inscription "stamps"), 495, XLI (with note in pencil: "Hotel des Strangers").
